mapper.select: SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.TRMN_AMNNO AS USER_MEM_NUM , A.MWMN_NA_TRPL_C , A.SRA_MWMNNM , A.FRLNO , A.ZIP , A.DONGUP , A.DONGBW , A.OHSE_TELNO , A.CUS_MPNO , A.MACO_YN , A.JRDWO_DSC , A.PSN_INF_OFR_AGR_YN , A.TMS_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.RMK_CNTN , A.CUS_RLNO , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , A.SMS_NO , A.SMS_YMD , A.MB_INTG_NO , A.AUTH_NO , A.AUTH_YMD , (SELECT MIN(DECODE(B.NA_BZPLC, #{naBzplc}, B.AUC_PART_LIMIT_YN, '1')) FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_BLACKLIST B WHERE B.MB_INTG_NO = A.MB_INTG_NO AND B.DEL_YN = '0' AND B.LIMIT_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY B.MB_INTG_NO) AS AUC_PART_LIMIT_YN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN A WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND A.DEL_YN = '0'

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.FHS_ID_NO , A.FARM_AMNNO , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW , B.FTSNM , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , G.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSCNM , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.INDV_SEX_C , F.SIMP_CNM AS INDV_SEX_CNM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.BIRTH,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTH , CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, C.BIRTH)) +1 <= 4 AND A.NA_BZPLC NOT IN ('8808990656199', '8808990656434') THEN 4 ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, C.BIRTH)) +1 END AS MTCN , NVL(A.PRNY_JUG_YN, '0') AS PRNY_JUG_YN , NVL(A.PRNY_YN, '0') AS PRNY_YN , NVL(A.NCSS_JUG_YN, '0') AS NCSS_JUG_YN , NVL(A.NCSS_YN, '0') AS NCSS_YN , NVL(A.RMHN_YN, '0') AS RMHN_YN , REGEXP_REPLACE(C.KPN_NO, '[^0-9]') AS KPN_NO , C.MATIME , C.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN , NVL(A.COW_SOG_WT, 0) AS COW_SOG_WT , C.RG_DSC , D.SIMP_CNM AS RG_DSCNM , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.PRNY_MTCN , A.RMK_CNTN , C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.MCOW_DSC , E.SIMP_CNM AS MCOW_DSCNM , A.BRCL_ISP_DT , A.BRCL_ISP_CTFW_SMT_YN , A.VACN_DT , A.VACN_ORDER , A.BOVINE_DT , A.BOVINE_RSLTNM , H.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AS CCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , H.INDV_SEX_C AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_C , I.SIMP_CNM AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_CNM , CASE WHEN H.BIRTH IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(H.BIRTH,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '' END AS CCOW_BIRTH , A.MOD_KPN_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRIM(A.AFISM_MOD_DT),'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AFISM_MOD_DT , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, H.BIRTH)) +1 AS CCOW_MTCN , A.DNA_YN , A.DNA_YN_CHK FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_DSC' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) D ON C.RG_DSC = D.SIMP_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_DSC' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) E ON C.MCOW_DSC = E.SIMP_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) F ON C.INDV_SEX_C = F.SIMP_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) G ON A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = G.SIMP_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST J ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = J.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF H ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = H.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = H.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = H.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = H.OSLP_NO AND H.RG_SQNO = '1' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) I ON ( H.INDV_SEX_C = I.SIMP_C ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.DEL_YN = '0'
AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = #{selStsDsc}
AND C.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6')
AND C.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6')
ORDER BY AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.TRMN_AMNNO AS USER_MEM_NUM , A.MWMN_NA_TRPL_C , A.SRA_MWMNNM , A.FRLNO , A.ZIP , A.DONGUP , A.DONGBW , A.OHSE_TELNO , A.CUS_MPNO , A.MACO_YN , A.JRDWO_DSC , A.PSN_INF_OFR_AGR_YN , A.TMS_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.RMK_CNTN , A.CUS_RLNO , A.FSRG_DTM , A.FSRGMN_ENO , A.LSCHG_DTM , A.LS_CMENO , A.SMS_NO , A.SMS_YMD , A.MB_INTG_NO , A.AUTH_NO , A.AUTH_YMD FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN A WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.AUTH_NO = #{authNo} AND A.AUTH_YMD >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , FHS_ID_NO||'-'||FARM_AMNNO AS USER_MEM_NUM , FARM_ID_NO , NA_TRPL_C , FTSNM , ZIP , DONGUP , DONGBW , OHSE_TELNO , CUS_MPNO , MACO_YN , RMK_CNTN , JRDWO_DSC , DEL_YN , ANW_YN , HDWK_RG_YN , SRA_FARM_ACNO , NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO , SRA_FED_SPY_YN , BIRTH , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , MB_INTG_NO , SMS_NO , SMS_YMD , AUTH_NO , AUTH_YMD FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUTH_NO = #{authNo} AND AUTH_YMD >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , TRMN_AMNNO , TR_DFN_YN , AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , RTRN_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , ATTC_NO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND DEL_YN = '0'
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO)+1, 501) FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO >= 501
INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR ( NA_BZPLC , AUC_DT , AUC_OBJ_DSC , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , TRMN_AMNNO , TR_DFN_YN , AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , RTRN_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , ATTC_NO ) SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , #{lvstAucPtcMnNo} , #{trmnAmnno} , '0' , 0 , '1' , '0' , '0' , SYSDATE , 'KIOSK' , SYSDATE , 'KIOSK' , NULL FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN A WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR B WHERE B.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND B.AUC_OBJ_DSC = A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND B.AUC_DT = A.AUC_DT AND B.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno})
mapper.select: SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , B.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSCNM , A.QCN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL B ON ( B.SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.SIMP_C AND B.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '2' ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND A.DEL_YN = '0'

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.AUC_ENTR_GRN_AM , A.RTRN_YN , B.SRA_MWMNNM , B.ZIP , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND A.DEL_YN = '0'

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , G.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSCNM , A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO , B.INDV_SEX_C , E.SIMP_CNM AS INDV_SEX_CNM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.BIRTH, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH , A.COW_SOG_WT , B.KPN_NO , C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AS CCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.INDV_SEX_C AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_C , F.SIMP_CNM AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_CNM , C.BIRTH AS CCOW_BIRTH , A.PRNY_MTCN , A.SRA_SBID_AM , A.SRA_SBID_UPR , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , A.RMK_CNTN , NVL(D.SRA_TR_FEE, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE , A.BRCL_ISP_DT , A.BRCL_ISP_CTFW_SMT_YN , A.VACN_DT , A.VACN_ORDER , A.BOVINE_DT , A.BOVINE_RSLTNM , A.DNA_YN , A.DNA_YN_CHK FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND C.RG_SQNO = '1' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(NVL(SRA_TR_FEE, 0)* DECODE(ANS_DSC, 1, 1, -1)) AS SRA_TR_FEE , NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO )D ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = D.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = D.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = D.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = D.LED_SQNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL E ON ( E.SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND E.SIMP_C = B.INDV_SEX_C AND E.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL F ON ( F.SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' AND F.SIMP_C = C.INDV_SEX_C AND F.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL G ON ( G.SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND G.SIMP_C = A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND G.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND B.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6')
AND B.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6')
ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.NA_BZPLNM , A.BRC , A.REP_BRC , A.BZNO , A.REPMNM , A.ZIP , A.DONGUP , A.DONGBW , A.TELNO , A.REP_BNK_C , B.SIMP_CNM AS REP_BNK_CNM , A.ACNO , A.RMK_CNTN , A.SEAL_IMG_CNTN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_WMC A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL B ON ( B.SIMP_TPC = 'REP_BNK_C' AND B.SIMP_C = A.REP_BNK_C AND B.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN /* 축산경매낙찰두수 */ , SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , SUM(C.SRA_TR_FEE_011) AS SRA_TR_FEE_011 /* 축산판매수수료 */ , SUM(C.SRA_TR_FEE_090) AS SRA_TR_FEE_090 /* 축산자조금 */ , NVL(B.TOT_CSH_RV_AM, 0) AS TOT_CSH_RV_AM /* 현금입금액 */ , NVL(B.TOT_CK_RV_AM, 0) AS TOT_CK_RV_AM /* 수표입금액 */ , NVL(B.TOT_BB_RV_AM, 0) AS TOT_BB_RV_AM /* 통장입금액 */ , NVL(B.TOT_ETC_RV_AM, 0) AS TOT_ETC_RV_AM /* 기타입금액 */ , (SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_011, 0)) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0)) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_ETC_CST, 0))) AS TOT_PYM_AM /* 총납입할 금액 */ , NVL(B.SRA_RV_AM, 0) AS SRA_RV_AM /* 총입금액 */ , (SUM(A.SRA_SBID_AM) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_011, 0)) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0)) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_ETC_CST, 0)) - (NVL(B.SRA_RV_AM, 0))) AS TOT_NPYM_AM /* 미납입금액 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_020, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_030 /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_040, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 /* 운송비 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_050 /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_060 /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_070 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_080, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_080 /* 주사료 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_100 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_110 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_120 /* 위탁수수료 */ , SUM(C.SRA_TR_FEE_011) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0)) + SUM(NVL(C.SRA_ETC_CST, 0)) AS SRA_FEE /* 총 수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN D.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN_F /* 암소 낙찰 두 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN D.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_AUC_SBID_HDCN_M /* 수소 낙찰 두 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN D.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SBID_AM_F /* 암소 낙찰 금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN D.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6') THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SBID_AM_M /* 암소 낙찰 금액 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , TRMN_AMNNO , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '1' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_CSH_RV_AM /* 현금입금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '2' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_CK_RV_AM /* 수표입금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '3' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_BB_RV_AM /* 통장입금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN SRA_RV_TPC = '4' THEN SRA_RV_AM ELSE 0 END) AS TOT_ETC_RV_AM /* 기타입금액 */ , SUM(SRA_RV_AM) AS SRA_RV_AM /* 총 입금액 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_MWMN_ADJ WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND DEL_YN = '0' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, TRMN_AMNNO ) B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = (CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE B.AUC_OBJ_DSC END) AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_011 /* 축산판매수수료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_090 /* 축산자조금 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_030 /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 /* 운송비 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_050 /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_060 /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_070 /* 검진비 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_080 /* 주사료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_100 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_110 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_TR_FEE_120 /* 위탁수수료 */ , SUM((CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C != '011' AND NA_FEE_C != '090' THEN SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) * (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END)) AS SRA_ETC_CST /* 축산기타비용 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '2' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC, AUC_DT, OSLP_NO, LED_SQNO ) C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = C.LED_SQNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV D ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = D.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = D.SRA_SRS_DSC ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmnAmnno} AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22'
AND D.INDV_SEX_C IN ('1', '4', '6')
AND D.INDV_SEX_C NOT IN ('1', '4', '6')
GROUP BY A.NA_BZPLC, A.AUC_DT, A.TRMN_AMNNO, B.TOT_CSH_RV_AM, B.TOT_CK_RV_AM, B.TOT_BB_RV_AM, B.TOT_ETC_RV_AM, B.SRA_RV_AM

SELECT DISTINCT A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , C.SIMP_CNM AS AUC_OBJ_DSCNM , B.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || B.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO , B.FTSNM , B.MACO_YN , B.JRDWO_DSC , B.DONGUP , B.DONGBW FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A INNER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = B.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = B.FARM_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL C ON ( C.SIMP_TPC = 'AUC_OBJ_DSC' AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.SIMP_C AND C.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO = '1' ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = NVL(#{aucDt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{aucObjDsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{aucObjDsc} END AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{farmAmnno} ORDER BY A.AUC_OBJ_DSC

SELECT A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , C.INDV_SEX_C , D.SIMP_CNM AS INDV_SEX_CNM , A.COW_SOG_WT , REPLACE(RTRIM(C.KPN_NO), 'KPN', '') AS KPN_NO , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_010, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_010 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_020, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_030 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_040, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_050 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_060 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_070 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_080, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_080 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_090 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_100 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_110 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_120 , NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) AS SRA_FED_SPY_AM , A.TD_RC_CST , NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS MT12_OVR_FEE , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS TOT_ETC_FEE , NVL((CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END), 0) - (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_010, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_020, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_040, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_080, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) AS TOT_AM , SUBSTR(C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.BIRTH,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH , CASE WHEN E.SRA_INDV_AMNNO IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(E.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) ELSE '' END AS CCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , E.INDV_SEX_C AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_C , F.SIMP_CNM AS CCOW_INDV_SEX_CNM , CASE WHEN E.BIRTH IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.BIRTH,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '' END AS CCOW_BIRTH , A.PRNY_MTCN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_010 /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_011 /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_030 /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_050 /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_060 /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_070 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_080 /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_090 /* 자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_100 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_110 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_120 /* 위탁수수료 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' ) D ON ( C.INDV_SEX_C = D.SIMP_C ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_CALF E ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = E.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = E.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = E.OSLP_NO AND E.RG_SQNO = '1' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SIMP_C, SIMP_CNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL WHERE SIMP_TPC = 'INDV_SEX_C' ) F ON ( E.INDV_SEX_C = F.SIMP_C ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{farmAmnno} AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ

SELECT NVL(SUM(SRA_SBID_UPR), 0) AS SUM_SRA_SBID_UPR , NVL(SUM(SRA_SBID_AM), 0) AS SUM_SRA_SBID_AM , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_010), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_010 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_020), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_020 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_030), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_030 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_040), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_040 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_050), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_050 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_060), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_060 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_070), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_070 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_080), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_080 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_090), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_090 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_100), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_100 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_110), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_110 , NVL(SUM(SRA_TR_FEE_120), 0) AS SUM_SRA_TR_FEE_120 , NVL(SUM(SRA_FED_SPY_AM), 0) AS SUM_SRA_FED_SPY_AM , NVL(SUM(TOT_ETC_FEE), 0) AS SUM_ETC_FEE , NVL(SUM(TOT_AM), 0) AS SUM_AM FROM ( SELECT A.AUC_DT , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , A.COW_SOG_WT , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_UPR ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM , B.SRA_TR_FEE_010 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_020, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_030 , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_040, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_050 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_060 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_070 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_080 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_090 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_100 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_110 , B.SRA_TR_FEE_120 , A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM , A.TD_RC_CST , A.MT12_OVR_FEE , NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS TOT_ETC_FEE , NVL((CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END), 0) - (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_010, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_020, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_030, 0) + (NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_040, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_050, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_060, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_070, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_080, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_090, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_100, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_110, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TR_FEE_120, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)) AS TOT_AM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_010 /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_011 /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_020 /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_030 /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_040 /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_050 /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_060 /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_070 /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_080 /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_090 /* 자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_100 /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_110 /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE - 1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TR_FEE_120 /* 위탁수수료 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' GROUP BY NA_BZPLC, AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO ) WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{naBzplc} AND A.AUC_DT = #{aucDt} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{aucObjDsc} AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = '01' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhsIdNo} AND A.FARM_AMNNO = #{farmAmnno} AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 )
